response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand its importance and significance to you, and I am eager to make this opportunity available to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you the chance to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction while maintaining the integrity and value of the product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or provide further details you might need. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
